description: Try our easy to follow Jacket Potatoes with Bacon & Mint Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jacket potato,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,BBQ,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Jacket Potatoes with Bacon & Mint Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup light sour cream (standard sour cream can be used)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a BBQ on high. Scrub potatoes clean. Wrap in aluminium foil. Place onto hot BBQ. Cover with BBQ hood. Cook for 25-30 minutes or until tender. Remove from BBQ but don't unwrap.
Place bacon rashers onto hot BBQ hotplate and cook for 3 minutes on each side until crisp. Roughly chop bacon and place into bowl. Add mint leaves and sour cream. Stir until well combined.
Remove potatoes from foil. Cut a cross on top of each one. Squeeze potato up from the base so that the inside is exposed. Spoon a dollop of bacon mixture on top and serve.
